name: Shiya Immitation
overview:
Established in the year 2007, we, “Shiya Immitation Products”, are an emerging business entity dealing in the domain of manufacturers, suppliers and wholesalers of a wide range of designer Imitation Jewellery. The Jewellery range has been designed by us keeping the latest fashion demands of the market in mind.

Our Team: Managers Jewelery designers Polishing experts Quality controllers Procurement agents

Our Quality: We are completely committed to quality and so far have been providing to our customers a qualitative range of imitation products only. Ensuring all the perfect aspects of our jewelery items, our quality analysts have been well versed in this process. Closely checking the quality of all unfinished diamonds, we ensure the flawlessness in each design and before using these in different processes.

Infrastructural Facilities: Acting as strongest pillars of our organization, our infrastructure is highly sophisticated and state of the art. The whole of the infrastructure has been well segregated into different units that are efficiently managed by our proficient managers.

Warehouse: Our spacious and modern warehousing unit helps in safekeeping of all our products. The unit is divided into various sections that allow us to segregate all the products in a systematic manner. This helps us ensuring easy access and quick retrieval of all the stored products.

Client Satisfaction: Each of our product has been designed by us keeping a strict compliance with the designer trends and this helps us in attaining complete customer satisfaction. We design these products for the fulfillment of the jewellery needs of our customers in a range of designs, patterns and shapes as well as different color shadings.
